advcl grant asked	15.060439779775294
ccomp says grant	14.367292599215348
case Snowden to	14.367292599215348
case Bolivia 's	13.674145418655403
dobj grant asylum	13.674145418655403

mark asked if	11.053106594542824
root ROOT says	5.774528220952037
